books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: A video of a shocking crime surfaces, casting suspicion on a San Francisco detective's colleagues.
books.name: 14TH DEADLY SIN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN

books.author: by Neal Stephenson
books.description: Five thousand years after a small number of survivors of the moon’s explosion took refuge on an international space station, their descendants contemplate a return to Earth.
books.name: SEVENEVES

books.author: by Mary Kay Andrews
books.description: Complications arise when a Hollywood location scout tries to arrange a shoot in a Florida Gulf Coast town.
books.name: BEACH TOWN

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport is on the trail of killers who have targeted a group of vagabonds called the Travelers.
books.name: GATHERING PREY

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful New York magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Bella Andre, Melissa Foster and others
books.description: A collection of 10 romance novels by 10 different authors.
books.name: LOVE, LAUGHTER, AND STEAMY EVER AFTERS
books.publisher: Bella Andre, Melissa Foster and others

books.author: by Ace Atkins
books.description: Spenser defends a high school student wrongly accused of terrorism and sentenced to a brutal bootcamp; a continuation of the series by Parker, who died in 2010.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER'S KICKBACK

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: After a car accident, two children are sent to live on their great-grandmother's Virginia farm. Originally published in 2000.
books.name: WISH YOU WELL

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A woman returning to her hometown discovers that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.
books.name: THE LIAR

books.author: by Darynda Jones
books.description: A woman explores a long-ago murder while seeking shelter in an abandoned convent.
books.name: EIGHTH GRAVE AFTER DARK

books.author: by Mary Alice Monroe
books.description: Three half sisters face transition and loss when the family's estate on a South Carolina island must be sold.
books.name: THE SUMMER'S END
